languages.text: "У корабля хороший потенциал! Если сменить оснащение, поменять офицерские посты и сделать еще перестановок по мелочи, выйдет совсем недурно".

traits.locale_text: "У корабля хороший потенциал! Если сменить оснащение, поменять офицерские посты и сделать еще перестановок по мелочи, выйдет совсем недурно".

languages.text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."
languages.original_text: "У корабля хороший потенциал! Если сменить оснащение, поменять офицерские посты и сделать еще перестановок по мелочи, выйдет совсем недурно".

traits.locale_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."
"This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."
"This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."
"This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."
"This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."
"This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."

languages.text: 「この船は将来有望です！船体を改装して、士官を入れ替えて、他にもあちこち手を加えれば、案外悪くない仕上がりになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."

traits.locale_text: 「この船は将来有望です！船体を改装して、士官を入れ替えて、他にもあちこち手を加えれば、案外悪くない仕上がりになるでしょう」

languages.text: "Dieses Schiff hat Potenzial! Wenn wir den Rumpf erneuern, die Offiziere ersetzen und hier und da noch ein paar andere Änderungen vornehmen, ist es gar nicht mal so übel."
languages.original_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Schiff hat Potenzial! Wenn wir den Rumpf erneuern, die Offiziere ersetzen und hier und da noch ein paar andere Änderungen vornehmen, ist es gar nicht mal so übel."

languages.text: « Ce vaisseau a du potentiel ! Après avoir changé la coque, remplacé les officiers et apporté quelques modifications de plus ici et là, il sera très correct. »
languages.original_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."

traits.locale_text: « Ce vaisseau a du potentiel ! Après avoir changé la coque, remplacé les officiers et apporté quelques modifications de plus ici et là, il sera très correct. »

languages.text: «¡Esta nave tiene potencial! Cuando reparemos el casco, sustituyamos a los oficiales y hagamos algún que otro cambio aquí y allá, no estará nada mal».
languages.original_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."

traits.locale_text: «¡Esta nave tiene potencial! Cuando reparemos el casco, sustituyamos a los oficiales y hagamos algún que otro cambio aquí y allá, no estará nada mal».

languages.text: “这艘船很有潜力！只要改装一下舰体，换掉那些军官，再在这里那里做些改动，这里就不会那么糟了。”
languages.original_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."

traits.locale_text: “这艘船很有潜力！只要改装一下舰体，换掉那些军官，再在这里那里做些改动，这里就不会那么糟了。”

languages.text: "Gemide potansiyel var! Gövdesini elden geçirelim, subayları değiştirelim, sonrasında ufak birkaç dokunuşla yepyeni olur."
languages.original_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."

traits.locale_text: "O gemide potansiyel var! Gövdesini elden geçirelim, subayları değiştirelim, bir de birkaç ufak dokunuş yaptık mı yepyeni olur."

languages.original_text: "This ship has potential! Once we refit the hull, replace the officers, and make a few other changes here and there, it won't be so bad at all."
